snippet: The request by the operator of the stricken Fukushima Daiichi plant is expected to be among many now that regulators have issued new safety guidelines.
abstract: Tokyo Electric Power Company, operator of stricken Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant, says it will ask regulators to allow it to start two reactors at separate site in eastern Japan; request is expected to be among many now that regulators have issued new nuclear energy safety guidelines.
lead_paragraph: The request by the operator of the stricken Fukushima Daiichi plant is expected to be among many now that regulators have issued new safety guidelines.

headline.main: Fukushima Plant Operator Intends to Restart Reactors Elsewhere
headline.print_headline: Fukushima Plant Operator Intends to Restart Reactors Elsewhere
